name: part_009
file: tmp_【 #沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE 】沙花叉クロヱと不思議なキノコ 【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [rvIy1IOZNtA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Chloe addresses the audience and introduces the first song.

subtitles.original: 全力で踊りますので 応援よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'll be dancing with all my might, so please support me!

subtitles.original: よっしゃーいくぞー！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go!

subtitles.original: ということで。
subtitles.english: So then.

subtitles.original: それでは、歌わせていただきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: Now, I'd like to sing.

subtitles.original: アイドル！
subtitles.english: Idol!

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: Stirring up the media with an invincible smile

subtitles.original:
アイドル
作詞・作曲：Ayase
subtitles.english:
Idol
Lyrics & Composition: Ayase

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: Wanna know her secret, so mysterious

subtitles.original: 抜けてるところさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her flaws are part of her charm

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: You are a perfect, lying...

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: genius idol

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？ 好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today? What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: If you were to go out, where would you go?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない それは内緒
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything. That's a secret.

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: Whatever I'm asked, I just dodge and weave.

subtitles.original: そう淡々と だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: So coolly, yet so brilliantly

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: The secrets that seem visible but aren't, taste like honey.

subtitles.original: あれもないないない これもないないない
subtitles.english: Not that, no, no, no. Not this, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？ 相手は？ さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who's the person? Come on, answer me!

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになるなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: “I don't really know what it's like to fall in love with someone.”

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない そんな言葉に
subtitles.english: To those words, whether they're lies or the truth, no one can know,

subtitles.original: また一人堕ちる また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Another person falls, made to love you again.

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone finds their eyes stolen away

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: By you, the perfect and ultimate idol

subtitles.original: 金劫際現れない
subtitles.english: A star that will never appear again,

subtitles.original: 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: The reincarnation of the brightest star.

subtitles.original: ああ その笑顔で「愛してる」で
subtitles.english: Ah, with that smile, with an "I love you,"

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: You captivate everyone and anyone.

subtitles.original: その瞳が その言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words,

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全な愛
subtitles.english: Even if they're lies, they're perfect love.

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special.

subtitles.original: 我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: We are just extras from the start.

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: We're just Supporting Role B, there to make the star shine.

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のおかげな
subtitles.english: Everything is thanks to that girl—

subtitles.original: わけない 洒落臭い 妬み嫉妬なんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: As if! How annoying. There's no way there's no envy or jealousy.

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃない からこそ許せない
subtitles.english: This isn't a joke, which is exactly why it's unforgivable.

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive you if you're not perfect.

subtitles.original: 自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself.

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't acknowledge anyone but you, who are stronger than anyone.

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じ崇めてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes and worships you.

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Truly the strongest and invincible idol.

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない
subtitles.english: No weaknesses can be found.

subtitles.original: 一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: You harbor the brightest star.

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: You must never, ever show your weak points.

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing the parts people don't want to know,

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: You must be one of a kind, or it's no good.

subtitles.original: それこそ本物の愛
subtitles.english: That's what true love is.

subtitles.original: 特意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Boiling up the media with your signature smile.

subtitles.original: 隠しきるこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: Just this secret, I'll keep it hidden forever.

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」って嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: A career built on the lie of "I love you."

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: This is my own kind of love.

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: The sweat that flows is a beautiful aqua.

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: These eyelids that hide rubies.

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing, dancing, and soaring, I am Maria.

subtitles.original: そう嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are the ultimate love.

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも
subtitles.english: Having never been loved by anyone,

subtitles.original: 誰かのこと愛したこともない
subtitles.english: Nor having ever loved anyone,

subtitles.original: そんな私の嘘がいつか
subtitles.english: Those lies of mine, I hope that someday

subtitles.original: 本当になること信じてる
subtitles.english: They will become the truth.

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: Someday, I'll surely get it all.

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: I'm a greedy idol like that.

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと
subtitles.english: In my true self, I want to properly

subtitles.original: ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: Love everyone,

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: So I'll tell lies again today.

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Wishing for the day these words will someday come true.

subtitles.original: それでもまだ
subtitles.english: Even so,

subtitles.original: 君と君にだけは言えずにいたけど
subtitles.english: I still couldn't say it to you and only you,

subtitles.original: ああ やっと言えた
subtitles.english: Ah, I finally said it.

subtitles.original: これは絶対嘘じゃない
subtitles.english: This is definitely not a lie.

subtitles.original: 「愛してる」
subtitles.english: “I love you.”

subtitles.original:
P.E.T.
作詞・作曲：DECO*27 / 編曲：Rockwell
subtitles.english:
P.E.T.
Lyrics & Composition: DECO*27 / Arrangement: Rockwell

subtitles.original: 繋いだ真っ赤な糸が
subtitles.english: The bright red thread connecting us

subtitles.original: 嬉しくてよしよししちゃう
subtitles.english: Makes me so happy, I want to pet you

subtitles.original: どこにも行かないように縛って
subtitles.english: Tie you up so you can't go anywhere

subtitles.original: ほら私だけに寄り添って
subtitles.english: Look, just stay close to me

subtitles.original: 良い子に出来てたのにな
subtitles.english: I was being such a good girl

subtitles.original: よそ見とべったり手垢
subtitles.english: Looking away and covered in sticky handprints.

subtitles.original: 今すぐ洗わなきゃ
subtitles.english: I have to wash them off right now.

subtitles.original: 誰になでなでされたのバッチィね
subtitles.english: Who gave you pets? How dirty.

subtitles.original: 愛のメトロノーム増して
subtitles.english: The metronome of love is speeding up,

subtitles.original: フレフレして見せてよ 期待の
subtitles.english: So show me your wagging tail, just as I expect.

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの？ 絶対絶対絶対好きでしょ？
subtitles.english: What's wrong? You definitely, definitely, definitely love me, right?

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの？ いっぱいいっぱいいっぱい愛して
subtitles.english: What's wrong? Love me more, more, more.

subtitles.original: 私だけの君じゃなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you're not mine and mine alone,

subtitles.original: ねえ嫌だよ
subtitles.english: Hey, I won't like it.

subtitles.original: ねえ君は
subtitles.english: Hey, you,

subtitles.original: ねえ誰に懐いてるんだろう
subtitles.english: Hey, who are you becoming attached to?

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの？ 絶対絶対絶対好きでしょ？
subtitles.english: What's wrong? You definitely, definitely, definitely love me, right?
